traits.label: to
traits.name: :to
traits.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'to' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

traits.label: exact
traits.name: :exact
traits.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'exact' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

traits.label: replace
traits.name: :replace
traits.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'replace' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

traits.label: active-class
traits.name: :active-class
traits.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

traits.label: exact-active-class
traits.name: :exact-active-class
traits.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

traits.label: href
traits.name: :href
traits.desc: Native <a> link href attribute; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props

traits.label: target
traits.name: :target
traits.desc: Native <a> link target attribute; Use it only along with 'href' prop; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props

traits.label: disable
traits.name: :disable
traits.desc: Put component in disabled mode

traits.label: model-value
traits.name: :model-value
traits.desc: Model of the component defining 'open' state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

traits.label: icon
traits.name: :icon
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: expand-icon
traits.name: :expand-icon
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: expanded-icon
traits.name: :expanded-icon
traits.desc: Expand icon name (following Quasar convention) for when QExpansionItem is expanded; When used, it also disables the rotation animation of the expand icon; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

traits.label: expand-icon-class
traits.name: :expand-icon-class
traits.desc: Apply custom class(es) to the expand icon item section

traits.label: label
traits.name: :label
traits.desc: Header label (unless using 'header' slot)

traits.label: label-lines
traits.name: :label-lines
traits.desc: Apply ellipsis when there's not enough space to render on the specified number of lines; If more than one line specified, then it will only work on webkit browsers because it uses the '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS property!

traits.label: caption
traits.name: :caption
traits.desc: Header sub-label (unless using 'header' slot)

traits.label: caption-lines
traits.name: :caption-lines
traits.desc: Apply ellipsis when there's not enough space to render on the specified number of lines; If more than one line specified, then it will only work on webkit browsers because it uses the '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS property!

traits.label: dark
traits.name: :dark
traits.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

traits.label: dense
traits.name: :dense
traits.desc: Dense mode; occupies less space

traits.label: duration
traits.name: :duration
traits.desc: Animation duration (in milliseconds)

traits.label: header-inset-level
traits.name: :header-inset-level
traits.desc: Apply an inset to header (unless using 'header' slot); Useful when header avatar/left side is missing but you want to align content with other items that do have a left side, or when you're building a menu

traits.label: content-inset-level
traits.name: :content-inset-level
traits.desc: Apply an inset to content (changes content padding)

traits.label: expand-separator
traits.name: :expand-separator
traits.desc: Apply a top and bottom separator when expansion item is opened

traits.label: default-opened
traits.name: :default-opened
traits.desc: Puts expansion item into open state on initial render; Overridden by v-model if used

traits.label: expand-icon-toggle
traits.name: :expand-icon-toggle
traits.desc: Applies the expansion events to the expand icon only and not to the whole header

traits.label: switch-toggle-side
traits.name: :switch-toggle-side
traits.desc: Switch expand icon side (from default 'right' to 'left')

traits.label: dense-toggle
traits.name: :dense-toggle
traits.desc: Use dense mode for expand icon

traits.label: group
traits.name: :group
traits.desc: Register expansion item into a group (unique name that must be applied to all expansion items in that group) for coordinated open/close state within the group a.k.a. 'accordion mode'

traits.label: popup
traits.name: :popup
traits.desc: Put expansion list into 'popup' mode

traits.label: header-style
traits.name: :header-style
traits.desc: Apply custom style to the header

traits.label: header-class
traits.name: :header-class
traits.desc: Apply custom class(es) to the header
